name: BRL Web
tag_list: marketing, online, web, design, url, columbus, redwood-city, gahanna, mobile, apps, web-design, brand-formula
overview:
BRL Web provides online marketing solutions to companies. They offer a marketing solution, “Brand Formula”, which covers a wide range of online presence mediums. They also offer their services independently of one another in addition to Brand Formula.

BRL Web was founded in 2010 when the creative divisions of two Columbus, Ohio based marketing agencies merged. It has since expanded with the acquisition of other online marketing agencies. It is currently has offices in Redwood City, CA (San Francisco) and Columbus, OH.
